Package io.github.struppigel.tools

Malware analysis tools that build upon the parser.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnomalyProb
    Represents the percentage of the two file sets, good and bad, to have one or several certain anomalies.
    AnomalyProb$  
    ChecksumVerifier  
    ChecksumVerifier$  
    ChiSquared
    Tool to calculate Chi squared for entire files, byte arrays or sections of a PE.
    ChiSquared$
    Chi squared calculation on a data stream with random data as expected data.
    DiffReportCreator  
    DiffReportCreator$  
    FileScoring
    Provides file scoring based on statistical information about PE files.
    FileScoring$  
    Hasher
    Creates hash values of PE files and sections.
    IconMatcher  
    IconMatcher$  
    ImpHash
    Tool to calculate the imphash of a PE file Based on algorithm in https://github.com/erocarrera/pefile/blob/master/pefile.py First mention of imphash in: https://www.fireeye.com/blog/threat-research/2014/01/tracking-malware-import-hashing.html
    ImpHash$
    Tool to calculate the imphash of a PE file Based on algorithm in https://github.com/erocarrera/pefile/blob/master/pefile.py First mention of imphash in: https://www.fireeye.com/blog/threat-research/2014/01/tracking-malware-import-hashing.html
    Overlay
    Detects and dumps overlay of PE files.
    PEAutoRepair
    Automatic repair for PE files or files that should be PE files.
    PEAutoRepair$  
    PEFileDumper
    Dumping of several PE file structures and embedded files.
    PortExAnalyzer
    Command line frontend of PortEx
    PortExAnalyzer$
    Command line frontend of PortEx
    ReportCreator
    Utility for easy creation of PE file reports.
    ReportCreator$  
    ShannonEntropy
    Tool to calculate Shannon's Entropy for entire files, byte arrays or sections of a PE.
    ShannonEntropy$
    Responsible to calculate non-file-specific entropies, i.e.
